content:
I was chasing an error message in another thread that led me to look at the path_get_info() function. Am I reading this right, that if (!isset($info)) { should actually be if (!isset($all_info)) {?

https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop/blob/1.x/core/modules/path/path.module#L590-L611

backdrop/backdrop
Backdrop core code repository. Contribute to backdrop/backdrop development by creating an account on GitHub.

Thx. Made an issue/PR for it.
https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4944

Variable typo in path.module 路 Issue #4944 路 backdrop/backdrop-issues
Description of the bug There is a typo in a variable name in the path.module file, function path_get_info(): https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop/blob/1.x/core/modules/path/path.module#L590-L611 Th...
Many thanks for the PR. I was able to review, but not to "test". Maybe backdrop_static() is redundant anyway in function path_get_info()?
